forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 37F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the morning. Remaining cloudy in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -3C with temps rising to -2 to 0. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low 26F with temps rising to near freezing. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening changing to light rain and freezing rain overnight. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning. Rain and snow will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become intermittent in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening followed by periods of snow showers after midnight. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.
